jobDescription: About The PositionOverview Glossier is looking for an IT Intern that lives and breathes technology, and loves nothing more than helping a teammate solve everything from a quick question to more complex, org-wide issues. We are looking for someone who is a strong communicator who wants to work in a collaborative environment and support the tech needs of a quickly growing business. You'll report to the Manager of TechOps and work closely with teams across all functions and offices to make sure the Glossier team has the tools it needs to thrive. ResponsibilitiesProvide front-line user support for all of Glossier's tools and technologies; troubleshoot, respond to inquiries and find solutions to technical challengesProvide hands-on and remote support/troubleshooting of video and audio conferencing equipment in conference room and mobile system environmentsStay updated on industry and technology trends, available products and services in supportQualificationsSupport experience with Windows, Mac OS, and LinuxExpertise in deploying and supporting desktops/laptops, video conferencing and various wireless devices.Experience in automation with scripting or programming languages such as Bash, Python, and/or ShellPreferred QualificationsA/V experienceA desire to learn mobile supportPrevious internship at a startupAbout Glossier Glossier is a beauty company that lives in NYC, is sold on the internet, and promotes a skincare-first philosophy that celebrates beauty in real life.
